bibl.title: Cartonnage Papyri in Context. New Ptolemaic Documents from Abu Sir al-Malaq.
bibl.note: P. Berlin Salmenkivi 1-20. - 1. Cartonnage Papyri in Context: Introduction. - 2. Unpublished Greek Documents from Cartonnage BL 383.1. [The same cartonnage has yielded the texts published in B.G.U. XVIII, 1, and consequently, the texts edited here will appear in the B.G.U.-series together with further documents.] - 3. Epilogue. - Concordance. Appendix. Indices. Bibliography.
bibl.seg: SALMENKIVI Erja, Cartonnage Papyri in Context. New Ptolemaic Documents from Abu Sir al-Malaq. (Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 119, 2002.)
Helsinki, Societas Scientiarum Fennica, 2002, 8°, 182 pp., 1 tabl. et 20 pll. ISBN 951-653-319-1. €22.

P. Berlin Salmenkivi 1-20. - 1. Cartonnage Papyri in Context: Introduction. - 2. Unpublished Greek Documents from Cartonnage BL 383.1. [The same cartonnage has yielded the texts published in B.G.U. XVIII, 1, and consequently, the texts edited here will appear in the B.G.U.-series together with further documents.] - 3. Epilogue. - Concordance. Appendix. Indices. Bibliography.

C.R. par Serena Ferrando, Maia N.S., 55 (2003) pp. 663-664. - Henri Melaerts, JEA 90 (2004), Reviews Supplement, pp. 57-59. - Amphilochios Papathomas, BibO 60 (2003) coll. 125-129. - Andrea Jördens, Gnomon 78 (2006) pp. 36-39. - J.G. Manning, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2003/2003-05-07.html >.
